g.text: • Locked to a specific instance family
.- Commit to a certain type of usage
is billed at the On-Demand price
• Linux or Windows - billing per second,
in a specific AZ for any duration
• Always access to EC2 capacity when need it
& Savings Plans to benefit from billing discounts
no matter if you run or not the instance
• Linux or Windows - billing per second,
The MOST cost-efficient instances in AWS
• Not suitable for critical jobs or databases
• for workloads that are resilient to failure:
• Up to 72% discount compared to On-demand
Pay Options: No Upfrnt+, Partial Upfrnt++, All Upfrnt+++
buy & sell in the Reserved Instance Market
